Description:
Creative Design: Produce high-quality, creative, and visually appealing designs for various digital platforms, including but not limited to social media posts, product catalogs, and creative banners.
Concept Development: Collaborate with the creative team to develop fresh and innovative design concepts that align with project goals and client requirements.
Social Media Graphics: Design engaging and shareable social media content, ensuring it aligns with brand identity and resonates with target audiences.
Product Catalogs: Create eye-catching product catalogs that showcase our products in the best possible light, making them appealing to our customers.
Banner Design: Design attractive and attention-grabbing banners for various online platforms, including websites and social media channels.
Video Editing: Edit and enhance video content to create compelling visual stories that captivate our audience.
Animation: Create animations and motion graphics that add a dynamic and interactive element to our designs and marketing materials.
3D Product Modeling (Plus Point): If you have experience in 3D product modeling, it's a plus! You may be involved in creating three-dimensional representations of our products.
Collaboration: Work closely with other team members, including copywriters, marketers, and project managers, to ensure the successful execution of design projects.Skills
Skills:
Experience: Minimum 6 to 10 years of experience as a Graphic Designer, preferably with a background in an agency or reputed company.
Portfolio: A strong portfolio showcasing your creative abilities, with examples of your work in social media posts, product catalogs, banners, video editing, animation, and any 3D modeling if applicable.
Creativity: Demonstrated ability to generate fresh and unique design concepts and ideas.
Software Proficiency: Proficient in industry-standard design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), video editing software, animation tools, and 3D modeling software if applicable.
Attention to Detail: A keen eye for detail and a commitment to producing error-free designs.
Communication Skills: Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and clients.
Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities.

Knowledge of emerging design trends and technologies.
Familiarity with web design principles.
Note: This position does not require experience in only print media design or 3D game design.
